data.name: Initial 2：New Stage - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Disc-1

1.Trio9
--Kobayashi Mika
2.Wordless Way
--Cristina Vee
3.Doom of Finis(Emi Vox)
--Emi Evans
4.Doom of Finis(Raj Vox)
--Raj Ramayya
5.Doom of Finis(Emi & Raj Duet)
--Emi Evans & Raj Ramayya Duet

Composer/Arranger:
Kevin Penkin
Raj Ramayya

Disc-2

1.New Stage
2.Vale Et Sera
3.Discordiae
4.Immoderata
5.Ferocia
6.Quae Vitari - with vocals
7.Quae Vitari - without vocals
8.Viri Sanguinum
9.Automata
10.Imitatio
11.Philosophia
12.Scientia
13.Ruinas
14.Fortem
15.Memoriae
16.Viatorem
17.Commotio
18.Unforgettable
19.DemoNihil
20.Wilderness

data.short_description: Original soundtrack of is presented by RestoryStudio(From China)、CyberJoker(From Japan) and StrawberryHillMusic(From U.S.A). All music is produced by StrawberryHillMusic(From U.S.A).
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i3 or higher
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 - 4500 or higher
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
